text: Natural language processing is a subfield of artificial intelligence
Machine learning algorithms can process large amounts of text data
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog near the forest
Python programming language offers excellent libraries for text analysis
Deep learning models achieve state of the art results in many tasks
Content analysis is a research method used in social sciences
Linguistic analysis helps understand patterns in written communication
Text mining extracts valuable information from unstructured text data
Sentiment analysis determines the emotional tone of written content
Corpus linguistics studies language using large collections of texts
Word frequency analysis reveals important themes in text documents
The type token ratio measures lexical diversity in written texts
Statistical methods help analyze patterns in language data
Computational linguistics combines computer science with language study
Discourse analysis examines language use in social contexts
Tokenization splits text into individual words or meaningful units
Lemmatization reduces words to their base or dictionary form
Stop words are common words filtered out during text processing
Named entity recognition identifies proper nouns in text
Part of speech tagging assigns grammatical categories to words
